Chile: a 9.4 M<sub>S</sub>-strong earthquake shakes Chile's Atacama Region causing tsunamis in Chile as well as Hawaii and Japan.
China:
Construction of the Forbidden City and Beijing city fortifications was completed.  The Yongle Emperor moved the Ming capital from Nanjing to Beijing.
The Ming tombs were built.
France: The Burgundians compelled Charles VI to sign the Treaty of Troyes, under which the throne was to pass to Henry V.
Malta: The 'Consiglio Popolare' is mentioned when King Alphonsus of Aragon mortgaged the islands to Antonio Cardona.
